about_the_game:
Grab Classic Monsters Pack S No.3 and bring some classic badness to your game! Have fun with your players by adding new, additional versions of these evolved monsters right after they fought against the first one! Lilith may look pretty but shes super deadly... and elemental monster has ice power now, challenging all players to be at their best!

This pack will expand the variation and possibilities of these lovable yet fearsome creatures.

Features:

* 4 monster battlers: Lilith, Ancient Sword, Gimic, Ice element in 4 color variations; day / sunset / night / rain. Total of 16 battler graphics.
* Each character comes with walking sprites in 2 variations (normal and dark shadow). Total of 8 sprites.
* For use in RPG Maker only
